text: Alluvioni Cambiò was a comune in the Province of Alessandria in the Piedmont region in Italy. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Alluvioni Cambiò and Piovera merged to form the new municipality of Alluvioni Piovera. Category:Former municipalities of Piedmont Category:Settlements in Alessandria
title: Alluvioni Cambiò
